nodes.text: The Bravis Sith Lightsaber was a type of lightsaber hilt used by the Bravis Sith. It was often used with the Bravis Sith Lightsaber Crystal.

The Bravis Sith Lightsaber first appeared in "Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures (video game)" as a reward for lifetime Jedi members during the SOE's Super Fan Holidays event that took place during late November, 2010. It came with the Bravis Sith Lightsaber Crystal.
